page.title: 03New Lodge.
page.content: New Lodge is a beautiful{old house } built in 1857 on the site of a much older building.It was built by Joshua Bates as a wedding present for his daughter and her husband,the Belgian Ambassador,who was a friend of Queen Victoria.The house has been a clinic,a home for refugees,a Dr.Barnardo's Home and a training school for British Rail catering staff.In 1972 New Lodge was bought by Barbour Index.The house is grand inside with views as far as the Chiltern Hills.Barbour Index produce a{Compendium of Building {Products}for the building trade and architects.The firm also provides a {Computer Output on Microfilm}service. Recently they introduced a new library service for architects who can get any information they need by telephone.95 people work for Barbour Index at New Lodge including the owner.
